page.title: 02TRANSPORT (IN LEWKNOR)
page.content: We have no public transport in our block. There is a bus, though, which is run by Houses of Watlington.On Tuesdays it comes through the villages from Watlington to Thame for the market and on Fridays it goes through to Chinnor. People catch it on the way back to Watlington to go to the doctor's surgery. Most households have one car, sometimes two but a lot of the older people don't. Bicycles are used quite a lot. There are hardly any motorcycles. ROADS- We have one main road, the B4009 which runs from Watlington to Chinnor. The other roads are mainly narrow, single track minor roads. We are very near to the M40.
